body_html:
To build TensorFlow from sources, please follow the procedure outlined in the website.

The scripts in the ci_build directory are specific to the machine setup on the continuous integration Jenkins worker machines (ci.tensorflow.org).

Since using the ci_build scripts for purposes other than the continuous integration setup is not a supported use case, I'd like to close this issue out.
body_text:
To build TensorFlow from sources, please follow the procedure outlined in the website.
The scripts in the ci_build directory are specific to the machine setup on the continuous integration Jenkins worker machines (ci.tensorflow.org).
Since using the ci_build scripts for purposes other than the continuous integration setup is not a supported use case, I'd like to close this issue out.
body:
To build TensorFlow from sources, please follow [the procedure outlined in the website](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources).

The scripts in the `ci_build` directory are specific to the machine setup on the continuous integration Jenkins worker machines (ci.tensorflow.org). 

Since using the ci_build scripts for purposes other than the continuous integration setup is not a supported use case, I'd like to close this issue out.
